title: How to get a new Straight Talk phone number - Quora

response.answer_text: It Depends. Is your cell a GSM (International & US access) or CDMA (US only networks) type? If it’s a GSM, then you have options. If CDMA, you’re screwed for the most part. BUT, some phones on the Verizon network (CDMA), can get a SIM card, from a local MAIN store (IF they have them) or order On-line. You may just buy a New GSM - SIM card (AT&T, T-Mobile, STalk, others) with a new number on it. Wally-world offers SIM Card Kits. Then, you select your Plan. Also, How old is your phone, is it a Smartphone? Sometimes it’s Cheaper to just Buy a New one, at Wally-World or AMZ.
